dct_title_s: Map of the Territory of New Mexico compiled by Bvt. 2nd. Lt. Jno. G. Parke, U.S.T. E. assisted by Mr. Richard H. Kern by order of Bvt. Col. Jno. Munroe, U.S.A. Comdg. 9th. Mil. Dept. ; drawn by R.H. Kern. Sante FÃ©, N.M. ; constructed under general orders from Col. J. J. Albert, Chief Corps of Topogl. Engrs
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Miles."
Shows topography, drainage, routes, trails, and "unexplored" areas.
dct_creator_sm: United States, Army., Corps of Engineers.
United States, Army., Corps of Topographical Engineers.
